name: parcel-html-game-big-head-charles-tag
description: Starter template for building static web apps with HTML partials, SASS, and JavaScript.

scripts.build: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production parcel build --public-url '.' ./src/index.html
scripts.pwa:build: pwa-asset-generator -b '#c9d955' -i ./dist/index.html -m ./dist/manifest.webmanifest -t png -w true --path-override ./assets/icons ./icon.png ./dist/assets/icons && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --output dist dist/index.html dist/manifest.webmanifest

author: Kendall Arneaud
